title: may 2: same-sex marriage in rhode island
description:
In this episode of 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia talks about the legalization of same-sex marriage in Rhode Island. After, she reflects on The Chicks’ famous Entertainment Weekly cover. Listen to this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
